title: Mastery Page Visual Bug
body: When hovering the mouse over the Keystone Masteries in the bottom of the Resolve tree the text box violently flutters back and forth in an attempt to stay close to the bottom of the page as well as realign itself with the center of the screen making it very hard to read or even click on the mastery to spend a point.

replies.body:
Expend the client window by just a little bit and it fixes the problem for you.

It's a known bug.
Weird, I've never seen this before.  Thanks for the help!

Well it has happened to me even before the 5.22 update

maybe just a client bug :)

and we're getting a new one soon so..
